Wolf Spider: Wolf Spider is a powerful tool that uses OCR technology to convert hard copy data into editable digital formats. Effortlessly transform physical documents, images, and printed text into searchable digital data with ease.
Wombat: Create customizable templates and generate reports effortlessly with just one click. Simplify your reporting process and save time with Wombat's intuitive design. Say goodbye to manual report preparation and welcome seamless efficiency.
Sentipede: The data-powered chatbot that visualizes and finds insights. Effortlessly generate reports and templates, saving time and manual work. Say hello to data-driven efficiency!
Possum: Seamlessly manage customer relationships and enhance your business efficiency. Possum offers a user-friendly interface, empowering your team to effortlessly track leads, automate tasks, and analyze customer interactions.
Bonsai: Secure case management software. Safeguard your sensitive data while streamlining your case workflow. Organize and manage cases effortlessly, optimizing your team's productivity.
Millipede: A.I.-enhanced online training modules. Reinforce your training content as users engage in real-time conversations with the A.I. chatbot. Boost knowledge retention and drive active participation, all while delivering your cutting-edge training material.
Tarantula: A.I. quotation system that analyzes visual and text data to generate accurate and complex quotes. Tarantula's deep learning capabilities enable it to interpret complex data, providing you with precise and data-driven quotes in no time.
